strava 0.0.0.9000

Get Route

Source: R/get_routes.R
get_routes.Rd

Returns a route using its identifier. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

Usage

get_routes(id, scope = "activity:read", client = strava_client())

Arguments

id

The identifier of the route.

scope

Authorization scope.

client

Strava client. By default, assumes you have client credentials stored in your .Renviron file.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
  get_routes("2964569522013822534")
}

# example response
tidy(strava_data$routes)
